code: protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("direct:start").doTry().to("direct:embedded").doCatch(ValidationException.class).to("mock:invalid").             from("direct:embedded").errorHandler(noErrorHandler()).doTry().process(validator).to("mock:valid").doFinally().setHeader("valid", constant(false)).end().         }     }. }
